CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c) || ISBLANK(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c) || ISNULL(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c), 'Green', IF( vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c >= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Red', IF( vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= 0, 'Green', CASE(vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyIntervalUnit__c, 'Seconds', IF(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c + (vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/(24*60*60)) <= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Hours', IF(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c + (vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24) <= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Calendar Days', IF(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c + vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), /* TODO: Gap - business intervals doesn't support business calendar */ 'Business Hours', IF(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c + (vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c/24) <= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Business Days', IF(vlocity_cmt__DueDate__c + vlocity_cmt__JeopardySafetyInterval__c <= vlocity_cmt__RequestedCompletionDate__c, 'Green', 'Yellow'), 'Green') ) ) )
CustomField.label: Jeopardy Status
